We hire software engineering interns and place them on teams we think they'd be successful. We place interns on teams based on what works best for Shopify. We're looking for interns to work in the following areas: • Software Engineering: to craft the code that powers commerce, creating the extendable products that scale the entire commerce stack. • Applied Machine Learning Engineering: to use extensive data to build products and create and fine-tune ML models. • Infrastructure Engineering: to build and develop the blocks that move all of Shopify forward. • Security Engineering: to detect, evaluate, and address security threats to Shopify and its merchants. • Shopify is a big part of the Ruby and Rails communities, and we're constantly improving our codebase to make it even better. You do not need prior Rails experience to apply to this internship! Job Requirements Working at Shopify: • You must be legally entitled to work in Canada for the entire duration of the Summer 2026 internship (May 4th to August 21, 2026). Shopify does not provide immigration support to intern candidates at this time. • This internship is a 4 month long, full-time, paid experience - interns are expected not to be enrolled in school full-time while working at Shopify. • As an Intern you must be able to work from one of our three offices: Montréal (490 Rue De la Gauchetière O), Ottawa (151 O'Connor Street), or Toronto (620 King West). Please note: if you don't currently live in Montréal, Ottawa, or Toronto, you must be willing and able to relocate for in-office experiences to one of these offices. If successful in your application, we will match you to a team when you start at Shopify. We're unable to accommodate requests for particular teams and location changes once an offer is signed. Onboarding: • Interns must be located in their office city by the first day of onboarding (May 4th, 2026) ready to work 9:00am - 5:00pm. Interns cannot work from outside Canada during their internship.
